attributes.action: let GCSE students who attend school attain a salary, like the teachers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that students who are taking their GCSE's should attain a salary per lesson, or per exam. This is as I beleive that GCSE students work very hard and do not really get paid/rewarded for this work. I also think the life of a GCSE student is also extremely stressful and I think they should receive compensation for this

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
